dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: It's the first day of school. The sun is shining and a new adventure awaits you!

dialogues.speaker: Yuki
dialogues.text: Hi! Are you new here? My name is Yuki!

dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: Nice to meet you, Yuki! Yes, it's my first day.

dialogues.speaker: Yuki
dialogues.text: Awesome! Want me to show you around the school?

dialogues.speaker: Yuki
dialogues.text: This is classroom 2-B. We'll be classmates!

dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: That's lucky! At least I already know someone.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: And so a new friendship begins...
